definition: to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: In this paper, a processing technology of pumpkin noodles was discussed by orthogonal experiment.
sentences.chinese: 以正交试验研究了制作南瓜挂面的工艺。

sentences.english: A new automatic packager of noodles is introduced in this paper .
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种新型全自动挂面包装机。

sentences.english: Dong small village hand if hair noodles, white light Ren is Guangping traditional food.
sentences.chinese: 董村手工挂面细若发丝，洁白光韧，是广平传统食品。

sentences.english: Do not mix cooked vermicelli soup, that is cooked for three minutes.
sentences.chinese: 挂面煮时不混汤，出锅即熟。

sentences.english: Their hair is wet, they have foils on their hair, they have no makeup on.
sentences.chinese: 她们的头发是湿的，头发上粘着箔片，清汤挂面。

definition: vermicelli made from mung bean starch etc
tofu skin (made by drying the skin that forms on the surface of soymilk during cooking, and therefore not actually made from tofu)
food made from wheat flour, such as noodles, dumplings, buns etc
